description: This file defines the interface 'IFbSettings' used for configuring and retrieving FB device settings and subscriptions, such as device name, country code, timezone, and event notifications.

classes.name: IFbSettings
classes.description: A virtual interface for FB device settings, detailing methods for getting and setting device parameters and subscribing to change notifications.

methods.name: HandleAppEventNotifier
methods.description: Registers or unregisters interest for a specified application event.

methods.name: SubscribeOnCountryCodeChanged
methods.description: Subscribes or unsubscribes from notifications about country code changes.

methods.name: GetTimeZone
methods.description: Retrieves the device's time zone identifier.

methods.name: SubscribeOnTimeZoneChanged
methods.description: Subscribes or unsubscribes from notifications about time zone changes.

methods.name: GetSecondScreenFriendlyName
methods.description: Retrieves the second screen's friendly name.

methods.name: SubscribeOnFriendlyNameChanged
methods.description: Subscribes or unsubscribes from friendly name change notifications.

methods.name: SubscribeOnDeviceNameChanged
methods.description: Subscribes or unsubscribes from device name change notifications.

ctags.name: IFbSettings
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IFbSettings : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
